content.text:
# List of states in the Holy Roman Empire (O)

This is a list of states in the Holy Roman Empire beginning with the letter O:

Orange itself seized by France1739: Acquired Nassau-Hadamar and Nassau-Dillenburg1743: Acquired Nassau-Siegen1747: Acquired the Netherlands1795: Left bank territory to France1806: United with Nassau-Orange-Fulda; then dispersed between various states1815: King of the Netherlands and Grand Duke of Luxembourg
